title: Dan Simmons
summary: Dan Simmons (born April 4, 1948) is an American science fiction and horror writer. He is the author of the  Hyperion Cantos and the  Ilium/Olympos cycles, among other works which span the science fiction, horror, and fantasy genres, sometimes within a single novel. Simmons's genre-intermingling Song of Kali (1985) won the World Fantasy Award.[1] He also writes mysteries and thrillers, some of which feature the continuing character Joe Kurtz.
